remarks: Properties that determine a poset (implicit structure version). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isposd.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. _V ) $.
isposd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
isposd.l $e |- ( ph -> .<_ = ( le ` K ) ) $.
isposd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> x .<_ x ) $.
isposd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ x ) -> x = y ) ) $.
isposd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ z e. B ) ) -> ( ( x .<_ y /\ y .<_ z ) -> x .<_ z ) ) $.
isposd $p |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
